contents.item: Two hands working can do more than a thousand clasped in prayer.
In the confrontation between the stream and the rock, the stream always wins, not through strength but by perseverance.
It's easier to start over than to work to make something last.
Every step was a victory. He had to remember that.
...remember that what has once been done may be done again.
contents.owner: Alexandre Dumas, The Count of Monte Cristo

contents.item: You know what I did after I wrote my first novel? I shut up and wrote twenty-three
Nothing great is ever achieved without much enduring.
Champions keep playing until they get it right.
Ninety-nine percent of all failures come from people who have a habit of making excuses.
It's the climbing that makes the man. Getting to the top is an extra reward.
the difference between perseverance and obstinacy is that one comes from a strong will and the other from a strong won't
Does the road wind up-hill all the way? Yes, to the very end.
A large oak tree is just a little nut that refused to give up.
A career must be husbanded. Care must be taken. Everyday must bring some small bit of progress. How would an artist with any self-worth act? Act that way.
contents.owner: Julia Cameron, Finding Water: The Art of Perseverance

contents.item: Do not be discouraged by the resistance you will encounter from your human nature; you must go against your human inclinations. Often, in the beginning, you will think that you are wasting time, but you must go on, be determined and persevere in it until death, despite all the difficulties.
contents.owner: Brother Lawrence, The Practice of the Presence of God

contents.item: Do you want to die, or do you want to die trying? Give up or give it a shot.
contents.owner: Nick Trout, Ever By My Side: A Memoir in Eight [Acts] Pets

contents.item: ...continue on the right path. You have potential...Don't give up. Don't let yourself get down and quit studying or fighting for what you want. One day something good is bound to happen. You just have to keep at it.
contents.owner: Isabela Pamelli Martins, Copadrama- A Brazilian Tragicomedy

contents.item: Everyone needs to have support from people who care about them, but ultimately if we don’t work hard and do our part, those dreams are nothing but wishes, fantasy.
contents.owner: Cindy Ray Hale, You & Me Forever: a Sweet Romance Collection

contents.item: The character of those who continually persevere and sacrifice are eventually completely reborn and when they rise from the darkness they've endured no stone can hold them down." -Rise...Roll Away The Stone
Search Scriptures continually.
